english: to have to, to need to (particle used to express capability, possibility, degree, effect...); must; ought to; to need to; will

examples.english: How much money do you `need to` buy a house?

examples.chinese: 要想成功,就`得`艰苦奋斗
examples.pinyin: Yào xiǎng chénggōng, jiù `děi` jiānkǔ fèndòu
examples.english: If you want to succeed, you `must` work hard

examples.chinese: 再不听话,就`得`挨批评了
examples.pinyin: Zài bù tīnghuà, jiù `děi` ái pīpíng le.
examples.english: If you don't do as you are told, you `will` get a telling off
Get a move on, the film's `just about to` start

english: to die; impassable; uncrossable; inflexible; rigid; extremely

examples.chinese: 我们要把出发的时间定死
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen yào bǎ chūfā de shíjiān `dìngsǐ`

english: to arrange; to plan; to set up

examples.english: I'll `fix` you up with a place to stay.

examples.chinese: 她把计划`安排`全弄糟了
examples.pinyin: Tā bǎ jìhuà `ānpái` quán nòng zāole
examples.english: She made a complete cock-up of the `arrangements`

examples.chinese: 我希望这些`安排`会得到你的同意。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xīwàng zhèxiē `ānpái` huì dédào nǐ de tóngyì.
examples.english: I hope the `arrangements` meet with your approval.

english: to be startled; to be shocked; to be amazed

examples.chinese: 她这么快就去了澳大利亚,让人`吃了一惊`
examples.pinyin: Tā zhème kuài jiù qùle Àodàlìyà, ràng rén `chī le yī jīng`
examples.english: he speed with which she left for Australia `surprised` everyone
He had a `startled` look on his face

examples.chinese: 这消息使他们大为`吃惊`
examples.pinyin: Zhè xiāoxī shǐ tāmen dà wéi `chījīng`

examples.chinese: 发现她在那，我感到很吃惊
examples.pinyin: Fāxiàn tā zài nà, wǒ gǎndào hěn `chījīng`
examples.english: I was `amazed` to find her there

english: crucial point; crux; key; crucial; pivotal

examples.pinyin: Wèntí de guānjiàn jiù zài nàlǐ
examples.english: Therein lies the crux of the matter

examples.chinese: 教师在学习中的`关键`作用是不该忽视的
examples.pinyin: Jiàoshī zài xuéxí zhōng de `guānjiàn` zuòyòng shì bù gāi hūshì de
examples.english: The `key` role of the teacher in the learning process should not be neglected

examples.chinese: 你们可以从中选择`任何`一个
examples.pinyin: Nǐmen kěyǐ cóngzhōng xuǎnzé `rènhé` yī gè
examples.english: You can choose any one of them

examples.chinese: 老板需要一份`详细`的报告
examples.pinyin: lǎobǎn xūyào yī fèn `xiángxì` de bàogào

examples.chinese: 他`详细`叙述了事情发生的经过
examples.pinyin: Tā `xiángxì` xùshùle shìqing fāshēng de jīngguò
examples.english: He recounted `in detail` how the incident occurred
It is `difficult` to play the piano.

english: temporary; provisional; for the time being

examples.chinese: 这个问题`暂时`放在一边

examples.english: She's on attachment to `(ie temporarily working in)` the Ministry of Defence

english: proof; certificate; identification; testimonial; to prove; to testify; to confirm the truth of

examples.english: She has `proved` herself over and over again

examples.chinese: 成功的主要`证明`是业绩
examples.english: The key `evidence` of success is the financial results

english: To form the habit of; to acquire; to cultivate; to raise
to sum up; to conclude; summary; resume

examples.chinese: 工作说明书概括`总结了`设计要求
examples.english: The job specifications `summarized` the design criteria

examples.chinese: 重要的建议都一一列入`总结`报告
examples.pinyin: Zhòngyào de jiànyì dōu yīyī lièrù `zǒngjié` bàogào
examples.english: Key recommendations are listed in the summary of the report

examples.chinese: 他把发言压缩成了一个10分钟的总结
examples.pinyin: Tā bǎ fāyán yāsuō chéngle yígè 10 fēnzhōng de `zǒngjié`
examples.english: He condensed the speech into a 10 minute `summary`
The descent of the elevator was quite swift

examples.chinese: 有些人就喜欢`批评`我们
examples.english: Some people just like to `put us down`

examples.chinese: 夏季,大家`普遍`使用空调,耗能巨大
examples.english: In summer, people all use air conditioners, which consumes plenty of energy

examples.chinese: 我不喜欢这些衣服，我喜欢`另外`那些
examples.pinyin: Wǒ bù xǐhuan zhèxiē yīfu，wǒ xǐhuan `lìngwài` nàxiē
examples.english: I don't like these clothes – I like the `others`

examples.chinese: 拒绝某事转而选择`另外`某事
examples.english: to reject something in favour of something else

examples.chinese: 我去了邮局，另外还去了果蔬店
examples.pinyin: Wǒ qùle yóujú，`lìngwài` hái qùle guǒshū diàn
examples.english: `In addition` to going to the post office, I also went to the greengrocer

english: since; as; this being the case

examples.chinese: `既然`你知道错误了，为什么不及时纠正呢？
examples.pinyin: `Jìrán` nǐ zhīdào cuòwù le，wèishénme bù jíshí jiūzhèng ne?
examples.english: `Since` you knew you'd made a mistake, why didn't you put it right immediately?

examples.chinese: `既然`他执意要去，你就答应吧
examples.pinyin: `Jìrán` tā zhíyì yào qù，nǐ jiù dāyìng bā
examples.english: `Seeing as` he's determined to go, why don't you just agree to it?

examples.pinyin: `Jìrán` nǐ bùnéng lái, wǒ jiù zìjǐ qù
examples.english: `as` you can't come, I'll go on my own
You may have had things to do, but why didn't you say so earlier

examples.chinese: `既然`你买不起为什么还要买
examples.pinyin: `Jìrán` nǐ mǎi bùqǐ wèishénme háiyào mǎi
examples.english: why did you buy that `when` you can't afford it

english: to develop; to grow; to expand; development; growth

examples.chinese: 中国的发展是对全球的重大贡献
examples.pinyin: Zhōngguóde fāzhǎn shì duì quánqiúde zhòngdàgòngxiàn
examples.english: The development of China has a lot to offer the world
The newspaper industry is doing rather well

english: investigation; inquiry; to investigate; to survey; survey; (opinion) poll

examples.english: He'll be `investigating` on his own account

examples.chinese: 九成`调查`者持赞同观点
examples.english: Ninety percent of the people `surveyed` were in favor
`At the time` he didn't know he'd broken the law

examples.pinyin: `Dāngshí` zài rèn de shì gè nǚ zǒnglǐ
examples.english: The `then` Prime Minister was a woman

english: whether (or not); if; is or isn't

examples.english: I don't know whether he agrees or not
ask him if he can come

examples.chinese: 球赛`是否`举行`还不`确定
examples.english: Its uncertain whether the game will be held.
It is unknown whether he will come

english: to notify; to inform; notice; notification
precisely; exactly; just in time; just right; just enough; to happen to; to chance to; by chance; it just so happens that

examples.chinese: 她的手指`正好`落在下巴尖上
examples.pinyin: Tā de shǒuzhǐ `zhènghǎo` luòzài xiàba jiān shàng
examples.english: Her finger fell `sharply` on the button

examples.chinese: 这条裤子他穿着肥瘦儿`正好`
examples.pinyin: Zhè tiáo kùzi tā chuān zhe féishòur `zhènghǎo`！
examples.english: This pair of trousers suits him `perfectly`
That cup of tea was `just the job`
a lover of `art/ an art` lover
The layout of the garden is very `artistic`

examples.chinese: 他们希望一辈子生活在一起，`永远不`分离
examples.pinyin: Tāmen xīwàng yībèizi shēnghuó zài yìqǐ，`yǒngyuǎn bù` fēnlí
examples.english: They want to be together all their lives, and `never` part
I will `always` keep her in my heart!

english: to use; to employ; to apply; to make use of

examples.chinese: 我奶奶正在学习使用电脑
examples.english: My grandma is learning `to use` a computer

examples.chinese: 人们正在过多地`使用`汽车
examples.english: people are `using` their cars too much

examples.chinese: `污染`正在危害我们所有的人
examples.pinyin: `Wūrǎn` zhèngzài wēihài wǒmen suǒyǒu de rén
examples.english: The `pollution` is killing all of us

examples.chinese: 中华民族是勤劳的`民族`
这条高速公路直通上海
examples.english: This expressway leads directly to Shanghai

examples.chinese: 我驾着车驶向`高速公路`
examples.english: I was steering the car towards the `highway`

english: to greet sb by word or action; to inform; to give prior notice

examples.chinese: 来跟我的小朋友`打招呼`
她向路过的警车`打招呼`，警察将他逮捕了
examples.pinyin: Tā xiàng lùguò de jǐngchē `dǎzhāohū`, jǐngchá jiāng tā dàibǔle
examples.english: She `hailed` a passing police car, and the police picked him up

examples.chinese: 她无精打采地跟她的客人`打招呼`
examples.pinyin: Tā wújīngdǎcǎi de gēn tā de kèrén `dǎzhāohū`

examples.chinese: 他跟我`打招呼`，我没答理他
examples.english: He `said hello` to me, but I didn't acknowledge him

examples.chinese: 没有提前`打招呼`，他就悄然离开了
examples.pinyin: Méiyǒu tíqián `dǎzhāohū`, tā jiù qiǎorán líkāi le
examples.english: He has gone over the hill without any `notice`

examples.chinese: 他们来的时候很少提前`打招呼`
examples.pinyin: Tāmen lái de shíhou hěnshǎo tíqián `dǎzhāohū`
examples.english: They gave little `warning` of their arrival

english: actually; outcome; result; after all (when all is said and done)

examples.english: Wherever does he wants to go?
what in the world is he doing

english: popular; fashionable; prevalent, to spread; to rage (of contagious disease);

examples.english: `Pop` music is not to my taste
Endemic diseases are `common` in this area

examples.chinese: 斗鸡在某些地方很`流行`
examples.english: Chicken fighting is very `popular` in some places
He wears his heart on his sleeve

examples.chinese: 我对你的`感情`依然如故
examples.pinyin: Wǒ duì nǐ de `gǎnqíng` yīrán rúgù

examples.chinese: 她为什么玩弄我的`感情`
examples.english: Why is she toying with my `feelings`
He kept out of our way

examples.chinese: 现成的解决问题的`方法`
examples.english: a ready-made solution to the problem
He accused the child of being `thoughtless`

examples.chinese: 下次工作时不要那么`粗心`
examples.english: Don't be so `careless` in your work next time

examples.chinese: 没有母亲会聘请`粗心`的保姆
examples.pinyin: Méiyǒu mǔqīn huì pìnqǐng `cūxīn` de bǎomǔ
examples.english: No mother will hire a `careless` babysitter

english: to express; to indicate; to mean; to gesture; to show; attitude

examples.chinese: 路上结冰了，`表示`温度是零下
examples.english: he road is iced up, which `indicates` that the temperature is below zero

examples.chinese: 他们不友好的`表示`激怒了我们
对于这个决定，他还未做明确的`表示`
examples.english: He still hasn't given a clear indication of his `attitud`e towards the decision
`to commend` somebody for something/ for doing something

examples.chinese: 刚被老师`表扬`，马克洋洋得意
examples.english: Just `praised` by the teacher, Mark is immensely proud of himself

examples.chinese: 受到她的`表扬`，他更努力了
examples.pinyin: Shòudào tā de `biǎoyáng`, tā gèng nǔlì le
examples.english: Reassured by her `praise` he pressed on

examples.chinese: 听到他的`表扬`，她非常高兴
examples.english: She was delighted to hear his `praise`

examples.chinese: 在网上订票的话，你可以在家或者公司打印`登机牌`
examples.pinyin: Zài wǎng shàng dìngpiào de huà, nǐ kěyǐ zài jiā huòzhě Gōngsī dǎyìn `dēngjīpái`
examples.english: If you buy your ticket online, you can print your `boarding card` from home or office
Would you show me your `boarding pass?`

examples.chinese: 建筑队在指定`地点`安营扎寨
examples.english: The construction crew set camp at the specified `place`

examples.chinese: 日期和`地点`都已经确定好了
examples.pinyin: Rìqī hé `Dìdiǎn` dōu yǐjīng quèdìng hǎo le

examples.chinese: 这个`地点`被栅栏围了起来
examples.english: The `site` is marked off with a fence
I `reckon` we should be able to finish tomorrow

examples.chinese: 他当即`估计了`一下形势

examples.english: The experts are `anticipating` a raise in taxes

english: worried; agonize; agony; annoyance; upset; vexation; worries

examples.chinese: 他们的文化生活很`丰富`
地下蕴含着`丰富`的铁矿
水果中含有`丰富`的营养

examples.pinyin: `Dá'àn` zài tā de liǎn shàng xiǎn'éryìjiàn
examples.english: The `answer` had been staring him in the face

examples.chinese: 有些问题还是没有`答案`的好
examples.pinyin: Yǒuxiē wèntí háishì méiyǒu `dá'àn` de hǎo
examples.english: Certain questions are better left without a`nswer`

english: have no choice but to; cannot but; have to; can't avoid

examples.chinese: 我`不得不`再一次从头开始
examples.english: I'll `have to` start all over again
I'm sorry, I didn't do it `on purpose`

english: to reduce; to lower; to bring down

examples.chinese: 她把价格`降低了`十欧元
这个项目的要求再次被`降低`
examples.pinyin: Zhège xiàngmù de yāoqiú zàicì bèi `jiàngdī`
examples.english: The project is `geared down` once again

examples.chinese: 油价另辟蹊径来`降低`费用
examples.english: Gas prices bring on new ways `to cut` corners
